def.name: Hepatitis A Doses Administered to Patient

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Hepatitis A containing Doses Administered to Patient

def.name: Date of Latest Hepatitis A Dose

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Date and time of last Hepatitis A dose

def.name: Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Hepatitis A containing Doses Administered to Patient that are in the Primary series

def.name: Number of Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Number of Hepatitis A Primary Series doses

a:s.a:s: "Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient"

source.name: Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient

def.name: No hepatitis A primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No hepatitis A primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis A-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

a:s.a:s: "Number of Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered

def.name: No hepatitis A primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No hepatitis A primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis A-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Live attenuated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1 dose schedule

a:s.a:s: "No hepatitis A primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: No hepatitis A primary series doses were administered

def.name: One hepatitis A primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: One hepatitis A primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis A-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Live attenuated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1 dose schedule

a:s.a:s: "Number of Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered

def.name: Two hepatitis A primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Two hepatitis A primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis A-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 2

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

a:s.a:s: "Number of Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of Hepatitis A Primary Series Doses Administered

def.name: Client's age is less than 12 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 12 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 12 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1-dose schedule

def.name: Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" ≥ 12 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1-dose schedule

def.name: The latest Hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest Hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis A-containing vaccines") < 6 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

operand.name: Date of Latest Hepatitis A Dose
Date of Latest Hepatitis A Dose

def.name: The latest Hepatitis A dose was administered more than 6 months ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest Hepatitis A dose was administered more than 6 months ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis A-containing vaccines") ≥ 6 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

a:s.a:s: "The latest Hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago"

operand.name: The latest Hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago

def.name: Client's age is less than 18 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 18 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 18 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Live attenuated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1 dose schedule

def.name: Client's age is more than or equal to 18 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is more than or equal to 18 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" ≥ 18 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Live attenuated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1 dose schedule

def.name: Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE) < 4 weekS

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Live attenuated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1 dose schedule

a:s.a:s: "Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

expression.name: Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE) ≥ 4 weeks

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Live attenuated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1 dose schedule

a:s.a:s: "No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

expression.name: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks
